utilities
Class OnDemandSingleFileLogger

java.lang.Object
  utilities.Logger
      utilities.SingleFileLogger
          utilities.OnDemandSingleFileLogger

public class OnDemandSingleFileLogger
extends SingleFileLogger

OnDemandSingleFileLogger is an extension of SingleFileLogger. It's used for logging to a single text file named like the logger. If logging file already exists, it will be opened and all new logging events will be appended or it will be overridden. The log file is opened (created) in the moment of it's first use and not before.

Author:
Oliver Schwahn
